helpScreen.instructions:
On the Tracks page, you can see the track ID on each track.

Not finished tracks are Orange.
Finished ones are Green.

Clicking a track that is not finished, opens a modal so you can Remove or Confirm the track.

Clicking on "Race !" opens a form to create a race based on your track.
Here you can select a date, hour, when the race will start.
You can add max number of participants and add 4 cashprizes: 1 for each podium member, and the fourth will be divided among all other participants.
Cashprizes will not be debited from you; you will have to distribute them yourself.

Once a track appears on the list (orange one), you can add as many checkpoints as you want, sometimes limited by the application (if so, it will be mentioned). Simply use the following :
helpScreen.addCheckpointInfo: to add a new checkpoint from your exact position.
helpScreen.instructions2:
If the race type is "Sprint":
The last checkpoint you add before "Confirming" the race will be the finish line.

If the race type is "Laps":
The last checkpoint you add will redirect participants, once they pass through it, to the first one of the race (start line).

createTrackScreen.instructions:
You are about to start creating a new track. Enter a name, then select the race type:
• sprint: from point A to point B.
• laps: race with several laps.
If you choose laps, you will be able to set the number of laps when creating a race from this track.
